title: Riccardo Corradin
text:
I am Assistant Professor (RTD-B) at the Department of Economics, Management and Statistics of University of Milano-Bioccca. My research is focused on Bayesian nonparametric statistics, covering methodological, computational and applied aspects. For more details, see my CV.

Experience
Assistant Professor | University of Nottingham (2022 – 2024)
Postdoctoral Researcher | University of Milano-Bicocca (2019 – 2021)
Eucation
PhD in Statistics | University of Milano-Bioccca (2015 – 2018)
MSc in Statistics | University of Padova (2013 – 2015)
BSc in Statistics | University of Milano-Bicocca (2009 – 2012)
